BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_title: JinBean - Life Service Platform for Overseas Chinese
Index.meta_description: A convenient and efficient life service platform for overseas Chinese and local residents, including housekeeping services, tool rentals, and community interaction

hero.description: A convenient and efficient life service platform for overseas Chinese and local residents

housekeeping.title: Housekeeping Services
housekeeping.description: Professional cleaning, maintenance, and moving services to make your home life more comfortable

tools.title: Tool Rental
tools.description: Share lawn tools, maintenance equipment, and more. Use as needed and save costs

community.title: Community Interaction
community.description: JinBean Circle community, share life experiences, and make neighborhood friends

join.title: Become a Service Provider
join.description: If you have professional skills, welcome to join our service team and provide quality services to the community

post1.author: Aunt Zhang
post1.content: Today I helped my neighbor trim the lawn using JinBean's tool rental service, very convenient!

post2.author: Master Li
post2.content: Getting more and more maintenance orders through the JinBean platform, thank you for your trust!

post3.author: Ms. Wang
post3.content: JinBean's cleaning service is very professional, the house looks brand new, highly recommended!

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
